title: Rita Ora and Andrew Watt ‘split’ yet again after reconciling their romance
text:
Both have been too busy to focus on dating (Picture: Getty)

Rita Ora has and her record producer boyfriend Andrew Watt have reportedly broken up yet again.

The Fifty Shades of Grey actress, 28, and her ex got back together earlier this year after splitting in September last year.

Andrew and Rita dated for two years before that and it looks like they’re going their separate ways once again, according to The Sun on Sunday.

He has apparently been telling pals that ‘this time it’s for good’.

The Hot Right Now singer and the producer, 28, tried to give their romance another chance in March to see if it was the real deal.

A source said at the time: ‘Rita and Andrew split because they were so busy, but they’ve realised they want to make things work.

‘Both of their schedules are crazy – Rita with her Phoenix World Tour and Andrew as one of the most in-demand producers in pop.

Before the bob (Picture: Rita Ora/Instagram)

Oh dear God, the bob (Picture: Crystal Pix/Timmie / BACKGRID)

‘But they reconnected this year and are making time to see each other when they can. They know what they have is the real deal.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Rita had a brief relationship with The Amazing Spider-Man actor Andrew Garfield after splitting from (other) Andrew last year.

Maybe she’s on a quest to date all the Andrews of the world.

Two down, three million to go.

Meanwhile, Rita is too busy with her new role in the reboot of Oliver Twist to be focusing on the split.

The singer was spotted with yet another dodgy wig because directors just keep insisting on giving her bobs for film roles.

She has been seen shooting scenes for the upcoming remake alongside Jude Law’s son Raff Law in London, where she was seen taking on the role of Dodge.

While we’re all excited to see Rita take on the big screen again, the hair department has done her seriously dirty with the wig they’ve put her in.

Reminiscent of the super-short black bob Rita had to wear in the Fifty Shades Of Grey trilogy for her role as Mia Grey, this platinum blonde number is also among the less flattering hairpieces she’s been put in for a role.

Metro.co.uk have contacted reps for comment.
